channel.title: Papers with Code: Trending (unofficial)
channel.description: As a disclaimer, this is an unofficial feed and has no affiliation with Papers with Code.

item.title: 3D Vision with Transformers: A Survey
item.description: The success of the transformer architecture in natural language processing has recently triggered attention in the computer vision field.

item.title: Deep Patch Visual Odometry
item.description: We propose Deep Patch Visual Odometry (DPVO), a new deep learning system for monocular Visual Odometry (VO).

item.title: Reconstructing 3D Human Pose by Watching Humans in the Mirror
item.description: In this paper, we introduce the new task of reconstructing 3D human pose from a single image in which we can see the person and the person's image through a mirror.

item.title: Multi-scale Multi-band DenseNets for Audio Source Separation
item.description: This paper deals with the problem of audio source separation.

item.title: Elucidating the Design Space of Diffusion-Based Generative Models
item.description: We argue that the theory and practice of diffusion-based generative models are currently unnecessarily convoluted and seek to remedy the situation by presenting a design space that clearly separates the concrete design choices.

item.title: YOLOv7: Trainable bag-of-freebies sets new state-of-the-art for real-time object detectors
item.description: YOLOv7 surpasses all known object detectors in both speed and accuracy in the range from 5 FPS to 160 FPS and has the highest accuracy 56. 8% AP among all known real-time object detectors with 30 FPS or higher on GPU V100.

item.title: Alpa: Automating Inter- and Intra-Operator Parallelism for Distributed Deep Learning
item.description: Existing model-parallel training systems either require users to manually create a parallelization plan or automatically generate one from a limited space of model parallelism configurations.

item.title: MobileNeRF: Exploiting the Polygon Rasterization Pipeline for Efficient Neural Field Rendering on Mobile Architectures
item.description: Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs) have demonstrated amazing ability to synthesize images of 3D scenes from novel views.

item.title: Ivy: Templated Deep Learning for Inter-Framework Portability
item.description: We introduce Ivy, a templated Deep Learning (DL) framework which abstracts existing DL frameworks.

item.title: Pretraining is All You Need for Image-to-Image Translation
item.description: We propose to use pretraining to boost general image-to-image translation.

item.title: Text-Guided Synthesis of Artistic Images with Retrieval-Augmented Diffusion Models
item.description: In RDMs, a set of nearest neighbors is retrieved from an external database during training for each training instance, and the diffusion model is conditioned on these informative samples.

item.title: Collaborative Neural Rendering using Anime Character Sheets
item.description: Drawing images of characters at desired poses is an essential but laborious task in anime production.

item.title: Multi-Scale 2D Temporal Adjacent Networks for Moment Localization with Natural Language
item.description: It is a challenging problem because a target moment may take place in the context of other temporal moments in the untrimmed video.

item.title: FRA-RIR: Fast Random Approximation of the Image-source Method
item.description: The training of modern speech processing systems often requires a large amount of simulated room impulse response (RIR) data in order to allow the systems to generalize well in real-world, reverberant environments.

item.title: Expanding Language-Image Pretrained Models for General Video Recognition
item.description: Extensive experiments demonstrate that our approach is effective and can be generalized to different video recognition scenarios.

item.title: Package for Fast ABC-Boost
item.description: Although the gain formula in Li (2010) was derived for logistic regression loss, it is a generic formula for loss functions with second-derivatives.

item.title: GAUDI: A Neural Architect for Immersive 3D Scene Generation
item.description: We introduce GAUDI, a generative model capable of capturing the distribution of complex and realistic 3D scenes that can be rendered immersively from a moving camera.

item.title: Deepchecks: A Library for Testing and Validating Machine Learning Models and Data
item.description: This paper presents Deepchecks, a Python library for comprehensively validating machine learning models and data.

item.title: Architecture-Agnostic Masked Image Modeling -- From ViT back to CNN
item.description: We observe that MIM essentially teaches the model to learn better middle-level interactions among patches and extract more generalized features.

item.title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning for Quantum Technologies
item.description: In recent years, the dramatic progress in machine learning has begun to impact many areas of science and technology significantly.
